setLight.description: Send a full light state object to the device. Not all properties will be supported by all devices.

returns.description: Returns the current state of the light after setting

alertLight.description: Switches to an alert state for a given number of seconds, before returning to the previous state IF the alert state is still active.

params.name: alertState
params.description: The time in milliseconds to alert for

returns.description: Indicates the light was returned to it's previous state. If this returns false, a new state was set in the meantime.
